skill.author: Chachamaru127

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill that provides guidance for UI component generation. It contains no executable code, network calls, or file system access beyond documentation files. The skill appears to be a legitimate UI development helper.

content.user_title: Generate UI Components and Feedback Forms
content.value_statement: Stop manually coding UI components from scratch. This skill generates accessible, responsive UI components and feedback forms using shadcn/ui and modern best practices.
actual_capabilities: Creates accessible UI with WCAG compliance
Includes hero sections, pricing tables, contact forms

use_cases.title: Rapid UI prototyping
use_cases.description: Quickly generate hero sections, pricing tables, and feature cards for landing pages

use_cases.title: User feedback collection
use_cases.description: Implement bug reports, feature requests, and satisfaction surveys in applications

use_cases.title: WCAG-compliant components
use_cases.description: Ensure all UI components meet accessibility standards with built-in checklists

prompt_templates.title: Hero Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a hero section with heading, subheading, and CTA button for a SaaS product using shadcn/ui

prompt_templates.title: Pricing Table
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a responsive pricing table with 3 tiers and feature comparison using shadcn components

prompt_templates.title: Feedback Form
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a feedback form with rating, category selection, and text input for bug reports

prompt_templates.title: Contact Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a contact form with validation, accessibility features, and proper labels

output_examples.input: Create a hero section for my startup landing page
output: ‚Ä¢ Semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy
‚Ä¢ High contrast text meeting WCAG 4.5:1 ratio
‚Ä¢ Keyboard-navigable CTA button with focus states
‚Ä¢ Responsive design for mobile and desktop
‚Ä¢ Alt text for any images included

best_practices: Always include alt text for images in components
Ensure keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
Use semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy
anti_patterns: Using color alone to convey information
Creating buttons without proper labels or ARIA attributes
Skipping heading levels (h1 to h3 without h2)

faq.question: What frameworks does this support?
faq.answer: Currently supports React with shadcn/ui components and Tailwind CSS

faq.question: Can I customize the generated components?
faq.answer: Yes, components are fully customizable with standard React props and Tailwind classes

faq.question: Does it handle form validation?
faq.answer: Yes, generated forms include client-side validation with accessible error messages

faq.question: Is the output accessible by default?
faq.answer: All components follow WCAG guidelines with built-in accessibility checklists

faq.question: Can it generate components in other languages?
faq.answer: Documentation is in Japanese but components can be generated in any language

faq.question: Does it install dependencies automatically?
faq.answer: It provides instructions for installing required shadcn/ui components
